info.official_title: Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy Combined With Apatinib for Inoperable or Iodine Refractory Thyroid Cancer: A Phase II Single-arm Study

identified_line.line: * Ability to understand character and individual consequences of the clinical trial. Willing to sign the written informed consent; Informed consent must be signed before the enrollment in the trial;

criterions.exact_snippets: Ability to understand character and individual consequences of the clinical trial.
Willing to sign the written informed consent
Informed consent must be signed before the enrollment in the trial

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Ability to understand character and individual consequences of the clinical trial.
Willing to sign the written informed consent
Informed consent must be signed before the enrollment in the trial

identified_line.line: * Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer, or postoperative residual disease detected by imaging studies, or progression disease within 12 months before enrollment. (all with measurable disease ≥10mm according to RECIST 1.1);

criterions.exact_snippets: Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer
Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer
Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer
postoperative residual disease detected by imaging studies
progression disease within 12 months before enrollment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer
Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer
Pathologically confirmed inoperable or iodine refractory thyroid cancer

or_criteria.exact_snippets: postoperative residual disease detected by imaging studies
progression disease within 12 months before enrollment

identified_line.line: * The survival period is expected to be greater than 3 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: The survival period is expected to be greater than 3 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: The survival period is expected to be greater than 3 months

identified_line.line: * Willing to accept adequate contraception for patients with childbearing potential.
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
* Take chemotherapeutic chemotherapy (the use of low-dose chemotherapy for radiosensitization was allowed) or thalidomide and its derivative treatments;

not_criteria.exact_snippets: the use of low-dose chemotherapy for radiosensitization was allowed

identified_line.line: * Uncontrolled high blood pressure and heart disease;
* Uroprotein positive (Uroprotein≥2+ or 24-hour urinary protein quantity >1.0g);

* Adequate laboratory values within 14 dyas of enrollment to study defined as follows: N ≥ 1500/mm^3; PLT ≥ 80,000/mm^3; HB≥90g/L;total bilirubin < 1.25ULN; AST/ALT < 2.5 ULN or < 5 ULN with metastasis; SCr ≤1ULN; CCR > 50ml/min;

criterions.exact_snippets: AST/ALT < 2.5 ULN or < 5 ULN with metastasis

or_criteria.exact_snippets: AST/ALT < 2.5 ULN or < 5 ULN with metastasis
AST/ALT < 2.5 ULN or < 5 ULN with metastasis

identified_line.line: * Take VEGFR-TKI within 1 month, such as vandetanib, cabozantinib, lenvatinib, sunitinib and sorafenib;

criterions.exact_snippets: such as vandetanib, cabozantinib, lenvatinib, sunitinib and sorafenib

or_criteria.exact_snippets: such as vandetanib, cabozantinib, lenvatinib, sunitinib and sorafenib
